interpretation: The "face with head-bandage" card suggests that you may be experiencing pain or injury, either physically or emotionally. It can indicate a need for self-care and healing, as well as the need to be gentle with yourself and take time to recover. This card may also indicate a sense of vulnerability or fragility, and a need for protection or support from others. It can be a reminder to prioritize your health and well-being, and to seek help if necessary.
